extendedInfo.description: The Lion Look  Live Wallpaper images of all time saved as a wallpaper on your smart phone for FREE!Are you ready to be a part of the most popular dance craze in recent recorded history? The Lion Look  Live ---Look no further...we have live motion images flying through your phone. Save as a cool wallpaper for ever. The Lion Look  Live Wallpaper you control in any direction as a Live wallpaper for FREE!! The Lion Look  Live Wallpaper is sure to impress with many directional options and easy user settings.Watch is these beautiful  The Lion Look  Live Wallpaper move freely in any direction and frequency you choose as a wallpaper for your phone. Moving  The Lion Look  Live images moving through your phone at a speed you choose.Your friends and family will be amazed by the coolest wallpaper application ever made!Simple install the application---go to your LIVE WALLPAPER settings--Choose the app labeled  The Lion Look  Live Wallpaper-and choose to save as background. Its that simple.You will enjoy this as a spectacular image as a background on your phone with little to no memory or batter usage.We do have ads, but you can opt out at any time by going to http://www.sendroid.com/optoutEnjoy and keep tuned for all the latest new features for this app with free updates!We ask that after playing with this application that you leave a positive review so that other users can benefit from your comments and enjoy this very top quality  The Lion Look  Live Wallpaper application.This is ad supported so we can pay our billsWe want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and or home screen. This will help keep it free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can optout notification ads from:Airpush Optout: http://www.airpush.com/optoutApp-Buks Optoutevery mobile landing page that the user is directed to has an "unsubscribe" link at the bottom, which opts-out a user with a single click.
